title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: In the Navigator, when selecting both P1 and P2, Open/Close project is not always available. It is expected that either both should be available or neither one should be enabled.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, it is observed that the Open/Close project options are not consistently available.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, both the Open and Close project options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2. 3. Close project P2.
